title: New leveling system
body:
When the new leveling system comes do u think the veteran players will get exp for the games they played when they reached level 30 ? im playing from season 2 and i think players like me should get the exp from the games they played when they reached level 30 .In other words they should get instant max level if they player for long enough . 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
They are removing level caps not making a new one at 50 or 100.

But yes I would like to be compensated proportionally for the number of games I've played over the years.
I've played over 5 years and it would be stupid if i had to level up again
I've been playing since s1. I feel what you mean, otherwise we're just the same as everyone else level wise. Even though we've already put our time in.
